lenders.name: elvedina
lenders.occupational_info: i wont to make my private kinder garden\r\nbecause in my land there is not enough\r\nthis kind of institution

lenders.name: Gakena
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get out of poverty, having first-hand experience of what poverty is. I know from experience that poor people have talents and skills, but lack of initials funds limits their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: As an employee, I am a research assistant/technician for surgical instrument processing and sterilization. As an entrepreneur, I work on projects for small to medium businesses.

lenders.name: Ginka
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Hazel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I have been in need before and was helped by friends. I want to give others a chance to help themselves.

lenders.name: Nic & Maurine
lenders.loan_because: It's just and it works
lenders.occupational_info: We do community development & primary healthcare among the poor here.

lenders.name: damilola
lenders.loan_because: i want to build my own personal school and to make it good for children.
lenders.occupational_info: well,my work is not easy to say,but i just did it because of my love for children.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Tanzania for two years as a Peace Corps Volunteer. The way I see it, small loans are sustainable and highly effective way of helping entrepreneurs grow their small enterprises. Thriving enterprises stabilize economies and are a way of effecting lasting change that permeates all aspects of life and lends hope for a brighter future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Nairobi for an international NGO that specializes in agricultural enterprise development (i.e. rural retailers of agricultural inputs) as a means of increasing smallholder farmers' access to agricultural inputs.

lenders.name: julia
lenders.loan_because: I am 30 years old, and I want to start, my own business as shoe designer, and  go ahead with my own mark
lenders.occupational_info: i design the shoe models first, then i send the draft to the manufacturer, as soon as the first model is ready then I oked, for  final production. I focus in women models.

lenders.name: Clifford & Chantal
lenders.loan_because: I saw a program on CBC about this organization and we disided to loan twice a month.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work for Manitoba Hydro and live in Gillam north of the 56th parallel.I work as gate control my hubby he delivers the mail to all the stations

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: Life is incredibly easy in the United States.  If I can make even the slightest difference in changing someone else\'s life than that makes these loans completely worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I will be completing high school this spring and will enter college seeking either a nursing program or possibly an engineering degree.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I feel we need to share our resources with  those who need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Wellness centre with traditional and natural medications.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: $25.00 hardly makes a difference here in the States, but my loans through Kiva actually help improve someone's life, including my own.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a great way to help people help themselves, not creating dependency or giving a handout, but letting them work towards what they want without the same feeling of indebtedness.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm working with high-risk youth, but hope one day to be working in development and international relations using renewable energy engineering.

lenders.name: Dea
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege  to be in the position of helping people.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children.  My husband provides for us.

lenders.name: Shannon Ryan
lenders.loan_because: as someone who started their own business 15 years ago, I know the value - and the importance - of a little bit of captial.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the CEO of an IT company

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: The United States in the richest country in the world, and we Americans are extraordinarily lucky to be U.S. citizens. We should help others who are less fortunate, and there is no better way to do so than directly to help entrepreneurs with little or no access to capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a political scientist, academic administrator, and university professor.

lenders.name: Michelle,Brian & boys
lenders.loan_because: we like to contribute to families to empower themselves.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: The trickle down system only works if  we become leaks in the pipe.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at an art school and provide general psychological services to private clients.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to run a restaurant and how to eat healthy.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: I believe with a little money and encouragement most people want to help themselves succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now. I worked as a social worker in a clinic which served all ages of people who had hearing problems as well as speech and language problems. I also worked as a social worker in our local school system and also worked as a teacher/vice principal.My primary responsibilities have always included finding ways for disadvantaged person to become independent.

lenders.name: Alain Portmann
lenders.loan_because: Money is needed to make money. Funding through micro loans is essential to provide working capital and begin to redistribute resources.
lenders.occupational_info: Advertising. Ideas. Marketing.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: sums of money that are small in the US can go a lot farther in other places.
lenders.occupational_info: i work at an after-school program

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m in grade 6.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is a great thing to do with some extra money.  It is like sharing a bit of the American Dream outside of America and helping to show Americans are not that bad.
lenders.occupational_info: My job as an I.C.S.(Inventory Control Specialist) Associate is to make sure the shelves are stocked both on the sales floor and in the back room.

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to support our fellow women & men around the world.

lenders.name: Jim and Sheri
lenders.loan_because: the world will be better with everybody having a better standard of living.  Kiva is one way I can help.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.occupational_info: Helping business organizations improve their operations and results.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Fast

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: My daughter, Ronalee Allen was killed in a head on collision May 30/08. She left a husband and 5 children, the baby only 13 months old. She fostered over 150 children. Her life was all about helping others and I want to honor her by continuing to help the less fortunate.  We are also raising funds to build an orphanage in Kitale, Kenya in her honor.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired.

lenders.name: Harbor
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of women physicians in Southern California interested in helping other women support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide medical care to women and underserved patients.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the very real difference that small loans can make in the lives of hard-working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language, and try to bring training, resources, and opportunities to my adoptive community.

lenders.name: McKay Family
lenders.loan_because: We love helping people just like us become more self-reliant.  Sharing some of the little bit of extra we have been blessed with is a pleasure - we love how we can share and then re-share over and over again.
lenders.occupational_info: We spend most of our time cleaning up after our children, looking for missing shoes and trying to ensure that homework gets done.  We also love to go hiking in the woods and mountains.  We enjoy our Sundays together and we are sad that our children are growing up so quickly.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I'm an independant businessman in Canada where it\'s pretty easy to get setup and apply for loans. I appreciate the freedom we have here and want to pass on some of that to others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a travel consulting business where I can supply airline tickets, trips, etc. to people from across the world. Part of the proceeds of my business are used to finance others through Kiva. Click on the link for more information.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Initiative needs to be supported...

lenders.name: John and Margaret
lenders.loan_because: It is a priveledge to help people who are trying so hard to improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Braxton Neate
lenders.loan_because: The world needs more compassion! This is my small way of giving back to the world and helping those who are less fortunate reach their goals in life.

lenders.name: GrumpyJay
lenders.loan_because: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.  -Bob Hope

lenders.name: spice of life
lenders.occupation: i pamper people by cleaning their houses.
lenders.loan_because: we have to much in this country, and don't appreciate it enough. i have been to guatemala, mexico and cuba and have seen what a little help can do to a family.

lenders.name: I am Bidong
lenders.loan_because: My family comes from a war torn third world country and it is nice to be able to provide some assistance to others in need by means of loans, not charity.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in marketing as my full time job -- I promote and sell a service.

My passion is photography. I'd love to hear what you think of some of my work.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a life of service to others and one way I can serve those less fortunate than I is to help them achieve their goals through financial assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student and plan on practicing medicine.

lenders.name: Joseph and Amanda
lenders.loan_because: Our awesome Uncle Gary gave us Kiva credit so we could help the world just a little bit.
lenders.occupational_info: Joseph works in building models of ocean waves and dynamics.  Amanda helps those in need in times of emergency.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It's a small act that can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to speak English.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I can..what a wonderful way to help someone help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: help people know about your product so you can sell more!

lenders.name: deborah
lenders.loan_because: i want other women to be able to support and further the educations of their children as I try to do the same for mine.
lenders.occupational_info: i help heal and rehabilitate sick or injured people in order that they can regain their independence and sense of self-worth

lenders.name: Darrel & Pam
lenders.loan_because: I believe, given the opportunity, these entreprenuers can be successful.  Successful small businesses are the foundation to any community and essential for the community to grow and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired commercial banker.  During my working years I was involved in some micro-lending and found it to be very satisfying.

lenders.name: Dennie
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people experience the love of God and share that love with others.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It feels great and it is such an empowering thing to be able to provide for yourself and for your family.  So many people in America take that ability for granted.  I want to help these people to better themselves, raise their qualities of life, and with their many blessings do the same for others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: In Costa Rica I met a wonderful woman who said, \"The hands that give are always full.\"  Since these treasures we have on earth won\'t last anyway, it makes all the more sense that I should give it away.  Hopefully people will wonder why I would do this, why I would give to and love these people around the world.  I would gladly say, \"because Jesus loved me first.\"  Praise God.  :)  In my life I have been influenced greatly by Jesus, Paul the Apostle, Martin Luther King Jr., Victor Hugo, Henry David Thoreau, Jean-Jauques Rousseau, and a few others that slip my mind.  I also sponsor a child in Rwanda and fight AIDS through an organization called Compassion International (www.compassion.com).  I promote sustainable agriculture and fight hunger, while giving people to power to provide for themselves and their families through Heifer International (www.heifer.org).  I also fight child abduction, the civil war in Uganda, and for civil liberties in Uganda through the Invisible Children organization (www.invisiblechildren.com).  I also will be going on Christian missionary trips with my church.  You should really check these out.  The bottom line in everything is that we love everyone.  We haven\'t the liberty to decide who we love, it must be everyone (Just like Jesus).  Love, love, love, love, love!

lenders.name: Justina
lenders.loan_because: Donation only goes so far.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend to people across the globe where credit and banks aren't an everyday thing as they are where I live. So, to increase circulation, I donate my money to people that will pay me back, and then re-dispersing that loan so more and more people can benefit from it!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's the right thing to do. I live in a country that uses far more than its share of the world's resources.  We've amassed wealth beyond need or reason.   It's our responsibility to share at least some of it.  The people looking for small loans through Kiva are trying to do something about their economic position -- I have to help them.

lenders.name: Marian
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me happy to be able to help someone in a small way to
improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create flower gardens for home gardens  and businesses.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a food store.

lenders.name: wes and jeannette
lenders.loan_because: To empower people and give them a  helping hand. And then do it again and again.This in my opinion makes a large impact on peoples lives and is the best way I  know of putting our money to use.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize the the crews, equipment, and projects to serve our customers.

lenders.name: ryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have less than I do.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: My daughter knew of my interest in microloans and gave my wife and me each a gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a physician in Hilliard, OH, since 1972, first in the ER and then as a family physician.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info: I was a dentist for over 20 years, and now I am retired.

lenders.name: papowitz sisters/mom
lenders.loan_because: We hope our children (melindas son pictured) will grow up learning from these far away entrepreuners about how to make a go of it--even in difficult circumstances--and about how to help out if you can.  Along these lines, we also dedicate our little fund to the memory of our immigrant grandparents.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I believe people need a hand more than they need a handout.  Banks often lend money to people who already have it and not to those who need it.  Doesn\'t make any sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a reporter with CityNews in Toronto, a local tv station.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing my good fortune
lenders.occupational_info: I work with internet based companies to improve their services.

lenders.name: Adumasa
lenders.loan_because:
It is a way to make a direct impact in a persons life.  
Each of us can use a helping hand at some point in our lives.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: The concept of small person-to-person loans really appeals to us.  Our daughter knew we liked this idea and found Kiva and gave us each a gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired I was a secretary at The Ohio State University in the Department of Family Medicine, so I am interested in helping people in healthcare.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: It takes many people to help each.

lenders.name: Husak
lenders.loan_because: Years ago I was in the same situation back in my country of origin where there was no help available like this. Thank goodness for technology where you can help people directly without government interference and corruption. Keep up the good work.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a truck and service beverage machines for a cola company.  I enjoy what I do for a living.

lenders.name: Jen & Jane
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it empowers people doing good work.  It makes life better for kids and their parents...for the whole community...for generations.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I\'m a capitalist, and I believe that capitalism is the way to personal freedom.  Kiva fosters capitalism because it allows people to be the best they can be by giving them financial independence, choices, and opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell steel for a small, family-owned business to manusfacturing companies across the world, mostly in the U.S.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: This is the most direct and influential way to make a significant change in another persons life without physically being there
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories with pictures

lenders.name: Reve and Susan
lenders.loan_because: an important aspect of our life is to invest in the development of others
lenders.occupational_info: We help people build and sustain powerful relationships in their business, community, and family.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to in a tiny way help others who did not have the luck I did to be born in a wealthy country
lenders.occupational_info: I go into homes and small busnisses and help people whose computers are not working to make them work. Also wife and I are trainers for Center for Nonviolent Communication.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: There have been people in my life who have helped me when I didn't have any money. I would not have been able to go to school if others had not made loans to me. I want to help others the way I was helped and as a way of saying thank you to those that helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the history of people from all over the world by looking at their skeletons. I work with archaeologists and study the skeletons they find. I am trying to learn about what life was like for people in the past. I've also started studying the chemistry inside of the skeletons to see what the diets and health were like for these people.

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is great to reward the working poor.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in our world family and am so lucky to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 48 years and I currently work teaching people how to be as healthy as they can.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others so they can help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that have experienced a disability or injury return to being independent in everyday life (provide physical rehabilitation to: get back to work, use a wheelchair, get dressed, feed themselves, etc.)

lenders.name: edward
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good and besides i can
lenders.occupational_info: as above

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching economics to college students.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because:
For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.
Matthew 25:35-36

Jesus Christ has saved my life and I desire to serve Him with all that I am.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: Gandhi said, "Be the change you wish to see in the world." With organizations such as Kiva, I believe this is possible.

lenders.name: Oisin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Cristiano and Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: \"All the believers were one in heart and mind. No one claimed that any of his possessions was his own, but they shared everything they had... There were no needy persons among them. For from time to time those who owned lands or houses sold them, brought the money from the sales and put it at the apostles\' feet, and it was distributed to anyone as he had need.\"
lenders.occupational_info: Cristiano is a manager at a large bank in Canada, helping people make good borrowing and investment decisions. Kathryn is an artist and mom-at-home taking care of baby Elena. We also own some rental properties, but we would ultimately like to move to a country like Mozambique to help or found a micro-finance organization.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a lower-middle class household by American standards, which is to say I am a very lucky person.  I\'ve managed to carve out a decent life for myself, and while I work a low-income job and live a modest life, I have enough.  And with the little extra I do have I can think of no more noble cause than helping to provide someone else with the opportunity to make their life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Brazosport College in Lake Jackson, Texas. I also have a full time job at a local hotel as a front desk associate.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: They best way to change the world is from the bottom up (economically speaking).  That is exactly what Kiva does, and it does it better than any other nonprofit organization in the entire world.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a means to a greater end.  Kiva is a part of that end.

lenders.name: Kaley
lenders.loan_because: I think this site is really neat.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a high school.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: there are good people all over the world if given a chance will do great things for themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach distance learning sociology.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I do it because even in these tough times, I still find the need to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We construct sustainable solutions and service.

lenders.name: Pascal
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance
lenders.occupational_info: Investigating new services put in place by Telecom companies

lenders.name: Cleo
lenders.loan_because: I needed something to do when I'm not sleeping, eating, or grooming myself.
lenders.occupational_info: By wrapping my paws around my owner's neck and purring while lying on her chest, I am able to ensure she falls asleep in a timely manner each night.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: The world gives to me so I give back to the world.

lenders.name: TribUrbana
lenders.loan_because: we believe it is a great way to empower and encourage others and to fight against the evil and injustice of poverty!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a community of people in the heart of Seville, Spain seeking to live as Jesus demonstrated: with Love.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: public radio broadcaster; microfinance volunteer

lenders.name: Bruce & Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family wants to help others help themselves and make the world a more tolerant and peaceful place.  By being happy and cheerful and helping others we can all make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an environmental engineer planning international development projects gearing them to be more sustainable and in harmony with the environment and social/cultural setting.  My wife is a school teacher and my two sons are currently in University.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans are the best way to combat poverty in the world to date.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I paint mostly wildlife.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have the spare change and its no risk.... why not help someone?

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: it helps me build connections with people in other places.  I love the fact that I can recycle the same money so that it can be used by more and more people.  The returns on my Kiva portfolio have easily outstripped returns on other investments.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell antique bird and animal prints.  The prints provide a wonderful connection to the past, and help people understand how our relationship to nature has changed over time.

lenders.name: taylor
lenders.loan_because: she is trying to help her family.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me in the past so I understand the difference a little help can make in someone’s life. At the end of the day it just makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Gosikh
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone else start a business.

lenders.name: Carlo
lenders.loan_because: I loan to add to the beauty that surrounds me.
lenders.occupational_info: Eh ... it involves thinking.

lenders.name: Trillium
lenders.loan_because: I would love to help

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.occupation: Teacher and Stay at home Mom
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me one year a gift certificate for Kiva.  He knew that my husband and I had gotten to the point that we felt that there was too much commercialization in our Christmas gift giving.  This was his response to that which we were thrilled to be a part of.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days right now raising my two kids.  I have stopped my career and have committed myself to our family.  Getting them ready for school, taking them to school, volunteering at their schools, helping them at home with projects and homework and making sure they are healthy and stimulated takes up most of my time.  I do however spend time reading, cooking, discussing parenting, and keeping myself informed on issues that are important to me.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: A memorial on behalf of Oscar, who passed away in 2006 from cancer.

lenders.name: Dr. Bill
lenders.loan_because: I hope by being involved in microfinance I can do my little part to help enrich the lives of at least a few people in underdeveloped countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach about natural resources, the enviornment, and conservation to college students.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference in someone else\'s life.

lenders.name: Gerry
lenders.loan_because: to encourage entrepreneurship with small steps at first.
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial Loan Officer and regional director

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: It can change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach conversational English to adults and children in Taiwan.

lenders.name: Jacalyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help folks who are in need and want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach yoga to adults in New York City and in Japan. I also train yoga teachers

lenders.name: dilan
lenders.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me money to donate as part of my christmas gifts so i can learn how to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Red Hen Baking Co.
lenders.loan_because: We can!
lenders.occupational_info: A wholesale bread bakery, baking and delivering certified organic bread everyday of the year!

lenders.name: Sina Motamedi
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide the opportunity for enthusiastic entrepreneurs to control their own futures through business. I love the idea of empowering individuals who are striving to lift themselves up through economic prosperity.

lenders.name: Tashi
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I both served in the Peace Corps in Honduras. We both understand the power even a small loan can have on someone's life and business in a developing country. We both feel that it is important to support these efforts at international development.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college professor and teach geology and geography at a community college.

lenders.name: Frazier
lenders.loan_because: In people I trust.

lenders.name: 5 Friends
lenders.loan_because: We've experienced adversity in our lives and we know what it is to receive a helping hand.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I'm lending to help make one person's life better and their communities more prosperous. I lend because it makes me feel great.
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver computer services to my customers helping them achieve their business goals

lenders.name: Peter & Melinda
lenders.loan_because: We have seen, heard and experienced a great deal about the success and personal satisfaction of micro-financing. One of the most enjoyable aspects of our world travel has been witnessing and being a part of many inspiring service projects.
lenders.occupational_info: We help produce Love, Intimacy and Sexuality workshops with the Human Awareness Institute.  Those workshops help people to communicate more clearly and with more heart. We also create many community events for that organization as well as work with schools to foster the emotional and social health of students through an organization called Challenge Day.

lenders.name: Clayton
lenders.loan_because: I travel quite a bit in the developing world and some of our business takes place there. It\'s nice to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an adventure travel company, developing new trips and managing the marketing department.

lenders.name: AJL
lenders.loan_because: Fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Jeniese
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: It is amazing what North Americans take for granted. I want to be part of making a difference for those who do not have the ready resources we do.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful use of the internet!  It's so simple to help someone who has a great plan to improve their circumstances but needs the help with the cash flow. Brilliant!

lenders.name: Jane in Phoenix
lenders.loan_because: It gives me goosebumps to see what people can do to change their lives when they follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I practiced law for 20 years and made a lot of money.  Now I follow what my heart tells me to do. I wish I always "got that."   Now I help local Arizona artisans by providing a space where we sell their work in Central Phoenix.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make animations for TV networks, commercials, documentaries and short films. I also take pictures of birds and other wildlife.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical researcher and physician-in-training interested in the treatment of cancer.

lenders.name: patti
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are here on this earth to help each other.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of the entrepreneur and realize how difficult it is to find someone who believes in you and your business plan.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to business people that specialize in fixing houses and selling them for profit in a short period of time.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.occupational_info: Musical and spiritual wondering ambassador.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to create a self sufficient life for themselves. Governments only take care of corporations, so it is up to the people to take care of  the people.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a commercial AAA community radio station.

lenders.name: Joe & Christy
lenders.occupation: IT Professional and parents of four
lenders.loan_because: after we watched a documentary on micro-lending in Bangladesh we just knew it was something we wanted to be involved in.

lenders.name: Lisa & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are problem solvers.

lenders.name: Debi
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sharen and Trevor
lenders.loan_because: It is important that everyone have a chance to improve their lives and the places where they live. Sustainability starts with individual commitment.
lenders.occupational_info: Sharen helps communities build parks and neighborhoods while protecting the environment. Trevor sells meat to restaurants. We both love to grow vegetables, cook, and be outdoors.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it\'s a great cause and it makes a difference in people\'s lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to produce the 6 o\'clock television newscast everyday.

lenders.name: Tod
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people better themselves in any way possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I create the graphics (images) for businesses. The logo, the advertising, the website, etc.

lenders.name: patricia w
lenders.loan_because: Working is better than worrying!

lenders.name: Lise
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good about helping somebody to succeed

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: It feels great, to be able to helpout a small business person achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a museum.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me in the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I preserve the history and culture of computer and other digital games.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes hard work is not enough, a helping hand can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired commercial fisherman.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: growing plants

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: I think I can really make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I don\'t have a job or go to work. I am a High School Freshmen. I play basketball, volleyball, and track & field. For fun at home I read and hang out with my family.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am helping to eliminate poverty one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
Environmental Biology Graduate.  

I intend to help reduce the ecological footprints and corresponding financial costs of institutions in both the public and private sector.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I don't believe in "us" and "them".  We are all one.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I work at my College serving food and drinks to my fellow students

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: We all need to be responsible for the world we live in and one way is to help others who are not as fortunate as ourselves. Lets make the world a beautiful place.

lenders.name: Paul & Susan
lenders.loan_because: Isaiah 58:7-9  Is it not to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter-when you see the naked, to clothe him,and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood? Then your light will break forth like the dawn, and your healing will quickly appear; then your righteousness will go before you, and the glory of the LORD will be your rear guard. Then you will call, and the LORD will answer; you will cry for help, and he will say: Here am I.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: i am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: i spend much of my time making a happy home for my husband and daughter.  my other time is spent working for my church volunteering -- whether at the food pantry or publicizing upcoming events.

lenders.name: Mike & Beth
lenders.loan_because: We're fortunate to have professional opportunities and we'd like to help provide opportunities to others.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: It Does Make A Difference
lenders.occupational_info: I get to meet and talk to people from all over the world.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this world together.
lenders.occupational_info: The loans I choose are based on women who are involved in small-scale farming, restaurant or food production.  In my career, I help communities and companies manage garbage and recyclables and solve water quality problems.

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I may not be able to do much but that doesn\'t mean I can\'t do something. Besides, knowing you helped in some small way to make a difference in someone\'s life - that\'s awesome.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: Capital matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run Somaliland's first law firm, Watershed Legal Services.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I used to travel, and met many people who had been poor as we once were.  People who rise out of poverty do it in only one way- a plan, a bit of help, and working very hard.  My parents did that with a $400 loan, my husband and I did that with $1,000, and I want to pass along that little bit of help. I cannot give you a good plan, nor can I do the hard work, but I can give a little help to make life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to travel all over the world showing people how to use computers to make money.  I was hurt in an accident and now I am at home. Now, I make beaded bracelets to give to people who need a smile, over 2,500 so far.  I write stories and make beaded sculptures of increasing complexity.

lenders.name: carly
lenders.loan_because: To support crafty woman everywhere.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I have a business of my own and I know how difficult it is to get a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Typesetting, graphics, multimedia, web design.

lenders.name: louise
lenders.loan_because: I would like to support people to make a difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in mental health - the aim of the organisation I work for is to reduce the stigma for people with mental illness and to promote the principles of normalisation and integration.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: 公務員

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it is a small way for me to give back to others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician. I spend my days trying to relieve suffering and pain and restore people to health.

lenders.name: amy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see entrepreneurs suceed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a marketing manager for a large global technical company

lenders.name: just me
lenders.loan_because: Out of habit, I used to buy cups of coffee I never really wanted, magazines I never read, and I paid for cable tv movies I never got a chance to watch. Now I forgo these things that I did not use/need and instead put some of that money to a much better use - helping people start or expand their business in hopes of covering basic expenses like putting food on the table and paying their childrens school fees. When you put it in perspective, its a pretty easy change to make in my everyday life as it has has few consequences for me, but huge rewards for the people who receive these loans.

lenders.name: Martha and Robert
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others to help themselves and to have a better life.

lenders.name: Stella Dot
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can/should/want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just working on talking

lenders.name: Jennie, Mike & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing my family can do to help fight poverty- as well as support the dreams of our brothers and sisters.

lenders.name: Luis & Chantel
lenders.loan_because: I saw coverage of Kiva on tv and thought that it was a great program to get involved with. Looking forward to continue lending.
lenders.occupational_info: Military Engineer

lenders.name: Norma and Robert
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Inger Klekacz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to do great things in the service of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I make photographs. Of everything and everyone. I love it.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people
lenders.occupational_info: Executive Management

lenders.name: Agnes
lenders.loan_because: for selfish reasons in that it makes me feel good to know I can help someone across the world in a small way.  I want to show my daughter how important it is to help others when possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying labor relations so workers in the United States can feel safe again to live.

lenders.name: Bernie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I measure things that our company makes to make sure they fit together properly.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business several years ago, and I know how difficult it is to get operating capital. I want to give back to others to help them start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional educator. I provide training and coaching services to educators, teachers and administrators to help them improve their schools and school systems.

lenders.name: sarah Blackmore
lenders.loan_because: my husband too is an entrepreneur.

lenders.name: MaggiesDad
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps make Maggie's world a better place!

lenders.name: ron @ carole
lenders.loan_because: a grain of rice will soon become a bag with a little help from our friends

lenders.name: James McBride
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the philosophy of microcredit. It can be way to tap into market forces in order to alleviate inequality, increase economic independence, and provide opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook traditional italian pizza in New York City.

lenders.name: www.cardsforkiva.com
lenders.loan_because: It is a sustainable way to restore impoverished communities by enabling individuals and families to do it themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Cards for Kiva is owned and operated by Jessica Tankersley and Kara Blain in Tulsa, OK.  We make and sell handmade greeting cards and then loan 100% of our profits through kiva.org.

lenders.name: deny david
lenders.loan_because: hola soy un chico que tengo deseo de seguir adelante

lenders.name: D. Fauser
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people who are ambitious and who want to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I'm Teaching Men (and women) to Fish!!

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I feel that people need to help other people in any way possible    as we are all in this life together.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a computer programmer for the State of Ca for 22 years, now retired.  I currently sell antique jewelry on the internet.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be self-sufficient

lenders.name: Matt & Kate
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to encourage others to succeed in the goals they set for themselves.  Having both worked at independently owned business in our small town, we believe that small businesses are the heart and soul of a community.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach English literature and composition at the same local high school (grades 9-12, ages 14-18).

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: Helping people through Kiva is much more personal and satisfying to me than the type of bank lending I have done for the last 35 years.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make decisions on whether my bank should make loans to businesses.  Often, the loans are very large.

lenders.name: Henny
lenders.loan_because: because it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: doctor for backs and joints

lenders.name: Grossman-Naples Family
lenders.loan_because:
Our family is grateful for what we have and we want to help others along the way.
Ari, Melissa, Doron, Rafi, Zohara, And Ziva.

lenders.name: katharine
lenders.loan_because: I love the personal stories and helping women to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize volunteers to do work for the non-profit I work for.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: If we truly are a global village, then these are my neighbours. My grandma taught me to share ~ and a wonderful friend showed me a way to do that using Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: I interview people about events that they have participated in or have been witness to; these interviews allow us to preserve our history in many different forms ~ from books to archives.

lenders.name: Ashlyn
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has unlimited potential. Watching the impact of what we can do as a community gives me hope and confidence for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I help communities find ways to ensure everyone is fed, housed, educated and safe.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: Others need help.
lenders.occupational_info: My goal is to not work. I'd rather be cycling or traveling.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want some of my money to work for those in need and not just me.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documents to help a computer company sell its services.

lenders.name: J
lenders.loan_because: I think I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal in knowledge management.  Sharing helps everyone prosper.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: It's a small world.
lenders.occupational_info: My professional occupation is Architecture - dedicate to healing, learning and discovery (healthcare, academic and research facilities).  Architecture inspires me because it is an expression of utility and delight with the potential to move people, improve their lives and transpire them to a higher level of consciousness.  I am fortunate to be involved with hospital projects, creating a place of comfort for patients and family members in their most profound moments.

lenders.name: Barbra
lenders.loan_because: It's a fast and easy way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: After a vacation with my family to Mexico, I realized how poor the country was and thought I would like to help out the people.  I also really liked their crafts.  I also liked to help out people that sell things in markets ESPECIALLY fish because I love fish so much!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Kylie, Dascha and Dima
lenders.loan_because: I think that the possibility of meaningful and enriching employment is critical to social change.  Hopefully my loans will enrich the lives of those who receive the funds, and promote sustainable growth in areas that otherwise would be prone to exploitation by neo-cons and international conglomerates.
lenders.occupational_info: I work everyday to help and protect some of the most vulnerable members of my community: domestic animals and low-to-zero-income people who don\'t have the resources to properly care for their pets.  I love working creatively to improve the quality of life for abused, neglected and abandoned animals, as well as bringing to justice those that willfully harm animals. In my spare time I garden organically...I hope to see the opportunity to loan to international farmers looking to explore organic and perma-culture agriculture! \r\n

lenders.name: Iris and Grand Daughter
lenders.loan_because: We're paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Family practice doctor.

lenders.name: Micky
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is what my Christian faith compels me to do out of love for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Judge as a Court at Law Administrator.  I set the court dockets and basically make sure that the Judge, the attorneys and the parties all show up on the same date at the same time.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will make a difference in the lives of people I will probably never meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electric power distribution lines for an electric power company.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: The best way to help others is to help them to help themselves, and loaning money through KIVA seems to be the next best thing to teaching!

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend the University of California, Berkeley.

lenders.name: David Fraga
lenders.loan_because: The market is the most efficient way to sustainably improve the lives of the working poor. Societal wealth venturing creates a virtuous cycle of sustainable profits, employment, economic growth, and increased government resources through increased taxable income.  Rather than aid, which treats symptoms instead of problems and thus must be given again and again, the same money loaned on sites like Kiva can be reinvested indefinitely.  Furthermore, each time it is invested, it can have a long-lasting and transformative impact on entrepreneurs and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Shutterstock, a digital stock photography company that provides high quality photos to creative professionals around the world.  I am also the Co-Founder LendforPeace.org, a microfinance platform similar to Kiva that focuses on the Middle East.

lenders.name: Dewdrop Digital
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping people improve their lives through their own hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: Outsourcing, website design and development, and digital marketing agency.

lenders.name: chrishon
lenders.loan_because: i know what its like to need help and was fortunate enough to get it, now its my turn
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories

lenders.name: Mae
lenders.loan_because: I believe anything is possible and people should have dreams and opportunities.  It\'s better in life to have tried and NOT have tried.  By the way, I have sponsored a girl from Kenya, Africa with World Vision Canada for the past 6 years and I pay $372 Cdn per year.  So $25 US is a small amount but, when others give the total amount is significant to the borrower.

lenders.name: Monica Moody
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who are helping themselves, providing for their families, growing business and cultivating communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to design everything from signs and billboards to web sites to items that are printed on paper (like brochures, menus, flyers, postcards, and more.)

lenders.name: Kids of Rich and Bekki
lenders.loan_because: Our new holiday family tradition is to pool our money and instead of purchasing gifts for each other, we loan the money to a new business. We love the positive change that Kiva encourages, and it is such a blessing to empower others to succeed in their own endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group a brothers and sisters, all of different trades...

lenders.name: Karon
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Asawari
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to try and better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privilege of helping select the amazing MFIs that Kiva partners with in various countries.

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.loan_because: i got a gift certificate from a friend

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: A small amount can give someone that first foot they need on the ladder of economic development.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to those wanting to build infrastructure in developing countries in SE Asia such as power stations, roads, ports and airports.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Jessica Flannery is my hero. For those of you who don't know, Jessica and her husband Matt are the co-founders of Kiva. As Biggie Smalls once said, if you don't know, now you know...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm at Stanford Graduate Business School right now... but I've gotta go out and get a real job by June. Yikes!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I can make a positive direct impact in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a public radio and TV station in Upstate New York.

lenders.name: Einar
lenders.loan_because: every little bit can help

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is so important that people have basic economic opportunities to better their own lives and the lives of their families, and I love the idea that I as an individual can help other individuals across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a treasure hunter for information

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to!

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: it gives me the chance to make a difference that really matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for almost 30 years.  I teach about social justice issues at the university.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: The banks will not.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial Plans for attaining various goals

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: it's the small, consistent actions that we take that mean the most and have the greatest impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Easing financial stress for those who are drowning in debt.  Helping to empower those who have lost all hope in building a brighter financial future.

lenders.name: James Allman-Gulino
lenders.loan_because: I want to help innovative entrepreneurs in places of the world that can't get capital easily.
lenders.occupational_info: I will be in Uganda from May to November  2010 completing a Kiva Fellowship.  I will be working with MCDT SACCO, Pearl Microfinance, and BRAC Uganda, so please check out their Field Partner pages!

lenders.name: Tom Z
lenders.loan_because: I am struck by the determination and hard work expressed in the people and their businesses showcased on Kiva.  I believe micro-financing is the only way that these folks will ever get a break and hopefully realize their hopes and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: we are farmers and I want to help others to expand their agricultural businesses

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: ...to let go of what I don't really need, and give it to people who do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research at a university in the Boston area.

lenders.name: Allahna
lenders.loan_because: To help her so she may have a better furture
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a student in the 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to Laos and Cambodia, and I have seen people with almost nothing because they have limited resources and opportunites.  I got this as a Christmas gift, but I want to help give people in developing countries opportunities for success.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research studies on alcoholism and HIV for a university.

lenders.name: Aaron, Casey & Riley
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have access to loans in order to start my businesses.  I'd like to give others the same opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I own two restaurants and I am a principal manager for a small environmentally friendly forest products company.  I am a single father with two wonderful daughters who are 9 and 10 years old.  I love to travel and have traveled with my daughters in order to teach them an appreciation for different parts of the world, different cultures and the fact that there are wonderful people all over the world.  I am involving them in our Kiva loans so they can build an appreciation for helping others.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to gain peace in the world is to help provide a path toward a good life for everyone willing to work for it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor at a university and I am also a beekeeper.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I want to treat others like I would want to be treated if I was in the same situation.
lenders.occupational_info: My company delivers wireless internet to emerging markets. Our mission is to bridge the digital divide to improve the world we live in by making it smaller
